mutants.original_line: apache_license_pattern = r"Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0"
mutants.code:
import re

def validateApacheLicense(licenseText: str) -> bool:
    apache_license_pattern = ''
    disclaimer_pattern = 'You may not use this file except in compliance with the License.'
    copyright_pattern = 'Copyright .*'
    permission_pattern = 'You may obtain a copy of the License at .*'
    conditions_pattern = 'Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software distributed under the License is distributed on an \\"AS IS\\" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.'
    return re.search(apache_license_pattern, licenseText) and re.search(disclaimer_pattern, licenseText) and re.search(copyright_pattern, licenseText) and re.search(permission_pattern, licenseText) and re.search(conditions_pattern, licenseText)

    apache_license_pattern = 'Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0'

import re

def validateApacheLicense(licenseText: str) -> bool:
    apache_license_pattern = 'Licensed under the Apache License, Version 2.0'
    disclaimer_pattern = 'You may not use this file except in compliance with the License.'
    copyright_pattern = 'Copyright .*'
    permission_pattern = 'You may obtain a copy of the License at .*'
    conditions_pattern = 'Unless required by applicable law or agreed to in writing, software distributed under the License is distributed on an \\"AS IS\\" BASIS, WITHOUT WARRANTIES OR CONDITIONS OF ANY KIND, either express or implied.'
    return re.search(apache_license_pattern, licenseText) or re.search(disclaimer_pattern, licenseText) or re.search(copyright_pattern, licenseText) or re.search(permission_pattern, licenseText) or re.search(conditions_pattern, licenseText)
